actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

official_title: To establish demonstration projects to provide family income to respond to significant transitions, and for other purposes.
short_title: Family Income to Respond to Significant Transitions Insurance Act

summary.text: Family Income to Respond to Significant Transitions Insurance Act - Directs the Secretary of Labor to make grants to a State or local government to pay for the Federal share of the cost of carrying out projects that assist families by providing wage replacement for eligible individuals who are responding to caregiving needs resulting from the birth or adoption of a son or daughter or other family caregiving needs.

titles.title: Family Income to Respond to Significant Transitions Insurance Act
To establish demonstration projects to provide family income to respond to significant transitions, and for other purposes.
